ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: To Aline Tátila Ferreira, Iule de Souza Bonelly, and the Department of Vigilância em Saúde of Casimiro de Abreu for their help in obtaining biological samples and their support in the field work. We also thank the Plataforma de Sequenciamento Fiocruz-RJ (RPT01A ― Sequenciamento de DNA - RJ).
